pages.text: $(info) $(thing)红石工具$()会在耐久消耗或待在$(thing)红石矿石$()附近时被激活。$(p)$(info) $(thing)红石工具$()会在玩家待在$(thing)红石矿石$()附近时缓慢回复耐久。$(p)$(info) 激活的$(thing)红石工具$() resist damage and are more likely to remain active by taking damage.
$(info) The $(item)Redstone Pickaxe$() has increased efficiency when active.
$(info) The $(item)Redstone Shovel$() has increased efficiency when active.
$(info) The $(item)Redstone Hoe$() tills dirt in a 3x3 area when active.
$(info) The $(item)Redstone Axe$() has increased efficiency when active.
$(info) The $(item)Redstone Sword$() has increased damage when active.
